event.description: Chone Figgins singles on a soft line drive to left fielder Jose Bautista.
With Bobby Abreu batting, Chone Figgins caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Rod Barajas to shortstop Marco Scutaro.
Bobby Abreu grounds out to first baseman Kevin Millar.
Vladimir Guerrero grounds out, first baseman Kevin Millar to pitcher Roy Halladay.
Torii Hunter strikes out swinging.
Kendrys Morales strikes out swinging.
Maicer Izturis grounds out, shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Kevin Millar.
Mike Napoli grounds out, pitcher Roy Halladay to first baseman Kevin Millar.
Gary Matthews strikes out swinging.
Howie Kendrick grounds out to first baseman Kevin Millar.
Chone Figgins called out on strikes.
Bobby Abreu called out on strikes.
Vladimir Guerrero flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Torii Hunter called out on strikes.
Kendrys Morales lines out to left fielder Jose Bautista.
Maicer Izturis singles on a line drive to right fielder Alex Rios.
Mike Napoli called out on strikes.
Gary Matthews called out on strikes.
Howie Kendrick singles on a ground ball to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Chone Figgins lines into a double play, left fielder Jose Bautista to first baseman Kevin Millar. Howie Kendrick doubled off 1st.
Bobby Abreu singles on a line drive to left fielder Jose Bautista.
Vladimir Guerrero singles on a ground ball to right fielder Alex Rios. Bobby Abreu to 2nd.
Torii Hunter walks. Bobby Abreu to 3rd. Vladimir Guerrero to 2nd.
Kendrys Morales singles on a line drive to right fielder Alex Rios. Bobby Abreu scores. Vladimir Guerrero to 3rd. Torii Hunter to 2nd.
With Maicer Izturis batting, wild pitch by Roy Halladay, Vladimir Guerrero scores. Torii Hunter to 3rd. Kendrys Morales to 2nd.
Maicer Izturis out on a sacrifice fly to right fielder Alex Rios. Torii Hunter scores. Kendrys Morales to 3rd.
Mike Napoli out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Vernon Wells. Kendrys Morales scores.
Gary Matthews called out on strikes.
Howie Kendrick strikes out swinging.
Chone Figgins grounds out, shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Kevin Millar.
Bobby Abreu strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Lyle Overbay replaces first baseman Kevin Millar, batting 7th, playing first base.
Vladimir Guerrero strikes out swinging, catcher Rod Barajas to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Torii Hunter called out on strikes.
Kendrys Morales singles on a line drive to left fielder Jose Bautista.
With Maicer Izturis batting, Kendrys Morales advances to 2nd on defensive indifference.
Maicer Izturis called out on strikes.
Marco Scutaro flies out to right fielder Bobby Abreu.
Aaron Hill pops out to first baseman Kendrys Morales in foul territory.
Alex Rios grounds out, shortstop Maicer Izturis to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Vernon Wells grounds out, pitcher Joe Saunders to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Adam Lind flies out to left fielder Gary Matthews.
Scott Rolen strikes out swinging.
Kevin Millar grounds out, second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Rod Barajas singles on a line drive to right fielder Bobby Abreu.
Jose Bautista triples (1) on a line drive to right fielder Bobby Abreu. Rod Barajas scores.
Marco Scutaro grounds out, shortstop Maicer Izturis to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Aaron Hill grounds out, second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Alex Rios homers (7) on a fly ball to left center field.
Vernon Wells grounds out to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Adam Lind grounds out, second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Scott Rolen doubles (16) on a line drive to right fielder Bobby Abreu.
Kevin Millar singles on a line drive to left fielder Gary Matthews. Scott Rolen scores.
Rod Barajas pops out to second baseman Howie Kendrick.
Jose Bautista strikes out on a foul tip.
Marco Scutaro grounds out, third baseman Chone Figgins to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Aaron Hill reaches on a missed catch error by first baseman Kendrys Morales, assist to third baseman Chone Figgins.
Alex Rios called out on strikes.
Vernon Wells strikes out swinging.
Adam Lind singles on a line drive to left fielder Gary Matthews.
With Scott Rolen batting, Adam Lind steals (1) 2nd base.
Scott Rolen singles on a line drive to left fielder Gary Matthews. Adam Lind scores. Scott Rolen to 2nd. Fielding error by left fielder Gary Matthews.
Kevin Millar doubles (6) on a line drive to left fielder Gary Matthews. Scott Rolen scores.
With Rod Barajas batting, wild pitch by Joe Saunders, Kevin Millar to 3rd.
Rod Barajas singles on a line drive to left fielder Gary Matthews. Kevin Millar scores.
Pitching Change: Rich Thompson replaces Joe Saunders.
Jose Bautista walks. Rod Barajas to 2nd.
Marco Scutaro flies out to right fielder Bobby Abreu.
Aaron Hill strikes out swinging.
Alex Rios flies out to left fielder Gary Matthews.
Vernon Wells pops out to shortstop Maicer Izturis.
Adam Lind flies out to center fielder Torii Hunter.
Pitching Change: Jason Bulger replaces Rich Thompson.
Scott Rolen flies out to right fielder Bobby Abreu.
Kevin Millar grounds out, third baseman Chone Figgins to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Rod Barajas strikes out swinging.
